accordions.title: Accounting
accordions.markup:
Accounting gives you a thorough understanding of how financial information is used by management, the government, and the public. This Intro text now should be a lttle more general about why to study this subject, rather than the benefits of a particular degree (which will be covered on the program page.)

accordions.title: Accounting, Publicâ€“CPA Preparation
accordions.markup: Balancing human needs with the preservation of a functional biosphere is an important responsibility for our future. To minimize human impact and move toward more sustainable practices, we must understand the causes of environmental change and the complex interactions within ecosystems, and design effective strategies for restoration. Our curriculum covers environmental monitoring, assessment, regulations, policy implementation, and science application in restoration activities.
